subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Islanders goalie Rick DiPietro halted Sidney Crosby’s 25-game points streak and limited the Penguins’ high-powered offense in a 2-1 shootout victory.
snippet: Islanders goalie Rick DiPietro halted Sidney Crosby’s 25-game points streak and limited the Penguins’ high-powered offense in a 2-1 shootout victory.
